TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteFieldInfoContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a field across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract> represents a field of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
To access one or more fields of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object. Then, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetField%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetFields%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData GetFieldData() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns information about the field that this identifies.
Docs.returns: A that provides information about the field that this identifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData> structure includes an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that specifies the type of the field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument GetValue(class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The that identifies the object that contains the field.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the field that this identifies.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the field value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValue (System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract obj, System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument value, int localeId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValue(class System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract obj, valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument value, int32 localeId) cil managed

Docs.param: The that identifies the object that contains the field.
A that specifies the field value.
The locale ID that the field will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
Docs.summary: Sets the value of the field that this represents.
